article_title: The Biotech Lobby Fights To Undermine Less-Costly Biosimilar Drugs

article_metadata.author: The Apothecary

og.description: By IKE BRANNON: Companies want to make more money for their shareholders, and there’s nothing wrong with that. But an effort to inhibit competition, done in the guise of protecting the consumer when it’s doing nothing of the sort should be recognized by the FDA for what it is.
og.title: The Biotech Lobby Fights To Undermine Less-Costly Biosimilar Drugs
